price: (20) And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wajāa min aqṣā al-madīnati rajulun yasʿā qāla yāqawmi ittabiʿū al-mur'salīna
